channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Update

item.title: CVE-2022-28541|2024-08-03T05:56:15.611Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20update
item.description: Uncontrolled search path element vulnerability in Samsung Update prior to version 3.0.77.0 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code as Samsung Update permission.
